name: ChapmanBlack
overview:
Founded in 2007 by Ezra Chapman and Richard Blackburn; responsible for building the largest Global SAP recruitment company. Their last venture, Red Commerce, proved this successful partnership and laid the foundations for high achievement and further success with ChapmanBlack.

We are on a mission to revolutionise the recruitment industry by creating an innovative business providing unique value to all of our stakeholders; customers, candidates and team.

Stakeholder centricity has been a driving force in the development of our business, impacting not just our services and offerings but also our culture and environment.

A consultative business development process allows us to identify and address our clients real needs, developing innovative solutions that go beyond solving just immediate hiring requirements.

We have an exceptional investment in research and development, focusing on processes and technology to ensure we provide the best possible service.

Our investment in developing our people is recognised within the recruitment industry and we have received coverage in industry leading journals for innovative training partnerships we have pioneered.
